name: LOCAL MULTIPLAYER SPACE PONG
description:
Hello everyone!

Welcome to the first page of my first game! 

I am new to unity, so this is very basic ping pong with few elements that add up to the fun! game is played only by joysticks because i wanted it to be one of chill and play game and didn't want to make an interface that forces 4 players to play on one keyboard! It is extremely simple to play the game, left controller stick is the one that moves and the right controller stick is responsible for rotation! Thats it!

game is playable as 1v1,2v1,2v2 however you want! To start your game you need to Extract "SpacePong" from the zip file,start the .exe and all you need to do is connect your XBox controller and press A to start the game!The game has very simple scoring UI and winner score is decided only by you for now! if you want to play untill 100, well thats also on you! :D

The game can also be played with a PS4 Controller as well, all you need to do is download DS4 tool , enter the .exe file, connect your joystick via bluetooth, and poof! You are ready to go! 

as this game is still early acces and even when it will be finished game will be free! All i want of you is to give feedback on what you would like to get me done, so i can start building my experience!

The game will always be free, and i dont expect any donations from it, as i know it is very basic and i wouldn't feel good to ask of any! 

Although if anyone really wants to donate i lowered reccomended donation to 1$ and every penny will be used for my further education towards Unity game developing! 

Thank you all for even visiting this page, good luck PONGERS!
